item.title: About
item.description: I build highly scalable, fast and efficient services for startups and organizations supported by architectures capable of handling the most demanding availability requirements of modern web applications.

item.title: Contact
item.description: It all begins with an idea. Maybe you want to launch a business, maybe you want to turn a hobby into something more or pehaps you have a creative project to share with the world. Whatever it is, the way you tell your story online can make all the difference.
